audioText: Si j'étais plus jeune, je croirais encore aux contes de fées.
question: What would the speaker believe if they were younger?
options: They would still believe in fairy tales
They would believe in scientific theories
They would believe in political promises
They would believe in supernatural powers
explanation: The text states 'Si j\'étais plus jeune, je croirais encore aux contes de fées' - If I were younger, I would still believe in fairy tales. 'Croirais' is the conditional form of 'croire' (to believe), expressing a hypothetical situation.
